name: The Impact of Inflation on U.S. Consumer Spending (2015-2024)
description: This dataset contains integrated monthly Consumer Price Index (CPI) and Personal Consumption Expenditures (PCE) data from 2015 to 2024, along with derived variables including inflation-adjusted real PCE and year-over-year growth rates. The dataset supports analysis of how inflation has influenced consumer spending behavior in the United States.

distribution.name: macro_monthly.csv
distribution.description: Integrated CPI and PCE data with derived variables

variableMeasured.name: cpi
variableMeasured.description: Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers

variableMeasured.name: cpi_yoy_pct
variableMeasured.description: Year-over-year percentage change in CPI (inflation rate)

variableMeasured.name: real_pce_yoy_pct
variableMeasured.description: Year-over-year percentage change in real PCE

isBasedOn.name: Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers: All Items in U.S. City Average (CPIAUCSL)

publisher.name: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, School of Information Sciences

funding.name: IS477 Data Management, Curation, and Reproducibility

citation: Shi, H., & Bingqing. (2024). The Impact of Inflation on U.S. Consumer Spending (2015-2024) [Dataset]. GitHub. https://github.com/haoyus7/is477_project
